hero.subtitle: You have a need, EBHI optimizes your operations with tailor-made solutions. Free yourself from administrative tasks and focus on your core business.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Your off-shore outsourcing company
about.description1: At Entrepreneur Business Hub International (EBHI), we are more than just an outsourcing service provider. We are your strategic partner, dedicated to transforming your operational challenges into growth opportunities.
about.description2: Founded on values of excellence, transparency, and collaboration, our company stands out through a personalized approach that adapts to the specific needs of each client.
about.description3: Our mission is to simplify your operations, reduce your costs and accelerate your growth by providing you with specialized talents and innovative solutions.

sectors.title: Our areas of intervention
sectors.subtitle: Expertise in all fields
sectors.footer: Whether you're in technology, design, commerce, engineering or chemistry, EBHI has the skills to meet your needs.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: A question? A project? Don't hesitate to contact us, we'll be happy to help you

approach.title: Our Methodology
approach.sectionTitle:
Discover the
excellence approach of EBHI
approach.subtitle: Our methodology is based on four fundamental pillars that guide each of our actions.

step1.title: Analysis & Optimization
step1.description: In-depth evaluation of existing processes and identification of improvement areas to maximize your efficiency.

step2.title: Project Structuring
step2.description: Methodical organization of resources and detailed planning of deployment to ensure success.

step3.title: Resource Mobilization
step3.description: Strategic deployment of skills and tools necessary for the success of your project.

step4.title: Integration & Continuous Improvement
step4.description: Implementation followed by a permanent optimization process for sustainable results.

pillars.title: The 4 pillars of EBHI
pillars.subtitle: Each letter represents a key aspect of our philosophy

e.title: Efficiency
e.description: Thanks to our outsourcing model, we help our clients improve their productivity and reduce their costs.

b.title: Structured Business
b.description: We establish a clear organization and defined processes to ensure smooth outsourcing.

h.title: Talent Hub
h.description: We bring together highly qualified and specialized professionals to meet the varied needs of our clients.

i.title: Innovation
i.description: We integrate cutting-edge technological solutions to optimize processes and offer increasingly high-performing services.

process.title: Our Process
process.subtitle: A 4-step process that is simple and effective to transform your needs into concrete solutions

step1.title: Needs Analysis
step1.shortDescription: Understanding your objectives and developing an adapted strategy
step1.description: Build a strategy that reflects you
step1.details: Every project starts with a phase of attentive listening. We take the time to understand your objectives, your challenges and your priorities. This fundamental step allows us to identify the key levers to build a personalized and effective strategy. Thanks to this in-depth analysis, we design a clear, realistic action plan that perfectly matches your vision.

step2.title: Recruitment
step2.shortDescription: Rigorous selection of talents meeting your criteria.
step2.description: Rigorous selection of talents meeting your criteria.
step2.details: We implement a demanding and methodical selection process, aimed at identifying the most relevant profiles. Our goal is to offer you candidates who not only meet your technical criteria, but also integrate perfectly into your environment and actively contribute to the success of your projects.

step3.title: Resource Setup
step3.shortDescription: Provision of all necessary equipment and premises.
step3.description: Provision of all necessary equipment and premises.
step3.details: We ensure the provision of all necessary equipment and infrastructure. This complete support allows you to focus fully on your objectives without worrying about logistical and technical aspects.

step4.title: Administrative Management
step4.shortDescription: Complete handling of administrative and disciplinary procedures.
step4.description: Complete handling of administrative and disciplinary procedures.
step4.details: We ensure comprehensive management of all administrative and disciplinary procedures. Our rigorous approach guarantees compliance with current legal framework and frees you from these constraints so you can focus on your core business.

services.title: Our Services
services.sectionTitle:
Outsourcing of
support and operational functions
services.subtitle: Our personalized approach ensures that each member of our team integrates perfectly into your structure and actively contributes to your objectives.

hr.title: Human Resources
hr.description: Complete management of your human resources with dedicated experts. Recruitment, training, career management and more.
hr.detailedDescription: EBHI supports you in the complete management of your human resources with dedicated expertise. We provide you with qualified professionals to optimize your HR management and develop your talents.

qualifiedTeams.title: Qualified teams
qualifiedTeams.description: Profiles selected according to your criteria

engineering.title: Engineering & Design
engineering.description: Custom engineering and product design solutions. From design to production, we support your projects.
engineering.detailedDescription: Our engineering and design expertise allows you to develop innovative and high-performing products. From the design phase to production, our engineering teams support you in all your technical projects.

chemistry.title: Chemistry Products & Design
chemistry.description: Expertise in chemistry and innovative product design. Development of chemical solutions adapted to your needs.
chemistry.detailedDescription: Our expertise in chemistry and product design allows you to develop innovative and high-performing solutions. Our teams of chemists and designers work on various projects, from research to production.

marketing.title: Marketing & Communication
marketing.description: Marketing and communication strategies to develop your presence. Content creation, social media management and advertising campaigns.
marketing.detailedDescription: Develop your presence and reputation with our marketing and communication solutions. Our creative and strategic teams support you in all your communication projects, from digital to print.

technicalSupport.title: Technical Support
technicalSupport.description: Reactive and professional technical support for your operations. 24/7 assistance and rapid problem resolution.
technicalSupport.detailedDescription: Benefit from reactive and professional technical support for all your operations. Our technical teams are available 24/7 to assist you and quickly resolve all your technical problems.

aftersales.title: After-sales Service
aftersales.description: Complete after-sales services to satisfy your customers. Complaint management, customer follow-up and continuous improvement.
aftersales.detailedDescription: Offer your customers an exceptional experience with our complete after-sales services. We manage all post-sale interactions to guarantee customer satisfaction and loyalty.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.sectionTitle:
They trust us,
and they talk about it!
testimonials.subtitle: Discover what our clients say about their experience with EBHI

testimonial1.name: Sabrina B.
testimonial1.text: Thanks to EBHI, we now benefit from reliable and responsive web support. Their team perfectly understood our needs and implemented effective solutions that facilitate our daily work.

testimonial2.name: Ronan L.
testimonial2.text: The recruitment and resource setup process was very smooth thanks to EBHI. We are extremely satisfied with their services, both in terms of quality and speed of execution.

testimonial3.name: Isabelle D.
testimonial3.text: EBHI has greatly facilitated the management of our customer support. Their team is available, responsive and professional, which allows us to focus fully on our core business.

cgu.title: Terms and Conditions of Use
cgu.subtitle: The rules and conditions for using our website

section1.title: 1. Presentation
section1.content:
The ebhi.fr website is published by Entrepreneur Business Hub International (EBHI), whose registered office is located at:
Office 7, Centre d'Affaires Jihane, Avenue du 11 Janvier, Marrakech.

section2.title: 2. Purpose
section2.content: These terms govern the use of the website. By browsing ebhi.fr, you accept these terms without reservation.

section3.title: 3. Site access
section3.content: The site is accessible free of charge, 24/7, except in cases of force majeure, maintenance or technical problems.

section4.title: 4. Intellectual property
section4.content: All content (texts, images, logos, videos...) is the exclusive property of EBHI, unless otherwise stated. Any reproduction is prohibited without prior authorization.

section5.title: 5. Liability
section5.content: EBHI cannot be held responsible for errors, inaccuracies or interruptions on the site. The user is solely responsible for the use they make of the information available.

section6.title: 6. Modification of conditions
section6.content: EBHI reserves the right to modify these conditions at any time. Users will be informed of major changes.

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.subtitle: Understanding how we use cookies to improve your experience

section1.title: 1. What is a cookie?
section1.content: A cookie is a small text file saved on your device when visiting a website. It allows user data to be stored to facilitate navigation and improve the online experience.

section2.title: 2. Why do we use cookies?
items: Ensure the proper functioning of the site
Measure audience and analyze visitor behavior
Personalize your navigation
Facilitate access to certain services

section3.title: 3. Types of cookies used
items: Strictly necessary cookies: essential for navigation.
Performance cookies: collect anonymous data on site usage.
Functional cookies: allow your preferences to be remembered.
Marketing cookies: used to display relevant advertisements.

section4.title: 4. Cookie management
section4.content: On your first visit, a banner offers you to accept or refuse cookies. You can also modify your preferences at any time via your browser settings.

section5.title: 5. Retention period
section5.content: Cookies are kept for a maximum period of 13 months.

legalNotice.title: Legal Notice
legalNotice.subtitle: Legal and regulatory information regarding the ebhi.fr website

section1.title: Site publisher
section1.company:
Entrepreneur Business Hub International (EBHI)
Office 7, Centre d'Affaires Jihane, Avenue du 11 Janvier, Marrakech

section2.title: Site host
section2.content: EBHI – Office 7, CENTRE D'AFFAIRE JIHANE AVENUE DU 11 JANVIER MARRAKECH – +33 1 84 60 38 50

section3.title: Intellectual property
section3.content: The site and all its content are protected by intellectual property rights. Any total or partial reproduction without authorization is strictly prohibited.

section4.title: Credits
section4.content: Design, development and content created by EBHI.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.subtitle: How we collect, use and protect your personal data

section1.title: 1. Data collected
items: Contact forms
Quote requests
Cookies
section1.content: The data collected may include: name, first name, email, phone, company, IP address.

section2.title: 2. Purpose of processing
items: Respond to your requests
Improve our services
Send you commercial information (with your consent)
Secure the site

section3.title: 3. Retention period
section3.content: The data is kept for the duration necessary for the purpose of processing or according to legal obligations.

section4.title: 4. Data sharing
section4.content: Your data is not sold or transferred to third parties. It may only be shared with technical service providers linked to EBHI.

section5.title: 5. Your rights
section5.content:
In accordance with GDPR, you have the right to access, rectify, delete, object and portability of your data.
You can exercise these rights by email at contact@ebhi.fr.

hero.title:
ABOUT
EBHI
hero.description1: ENTREPRENEUR BUSINESS HUB INTERNATIONAL is an international operational hub serving ambitious companies.
hero.description2: We don't sell generic services. We set up — for you, with you — the human, technical and digital resources you need to realize your development projects, dividing your costs and increasing your capacity for action.

approach.title:
Our
approach
approach.intro: At EBHI, every project is a close and strategic collaboration. We don't deliver generic services, but intelligently designed solutions, ready to be activated.
items: Qualified and dedicated human resources
High-performance technical tools
An agile digital structure
approach.text1: And localized supervision in our international hubs.
approach.text2: We operate in areas with high economic potential while respecting the quality, security and confidentiality requirements of European standards.

features.title: Strategic hubs
features.description: Global presence with locations on several continents

features.title: European standards
features.description: Quality, security and confidentiality compliant with European requirements

features.title: Economic potential
features.description: High-potential areas to optimize your costs and growth

locations.title:
Local anchoring,
global vision
locations.description: Our locations in Casablanca, Marrakech, Dakar, Antananarivo, Paris and Cergy are designed as operational hubs, enabling us to meet proximity, availability and agility challenges.
locations.highlight: We don't just bring you outsourced labor, but a true structured extension of your organization.

mission.title:
A clear
mission
mission.statement: Open the world to ambitious companies.
mission.description: We believe it's time to free companies from geographical, operational or administrative constraints.
mission.internationalDescription:
We manage your projects at the local level
with a global strategic vision

promise.title:
Our
promise
promise.intro: EBHI is your strategic partner, not just a service provider. We centralize complexity to allow you to focus on what matters: your growth.
steps: We ensure execution with rigor, confidentiality and performance.

values.title: Excellence
values.description: we only recruit profiles capable of carrying your image

values.title: Clarity
values.description: you know who works on what, when and how

values.title: Discretion
values.description: the confidentiality of your projects is a priority

values.title: Agility
values.description: your needs evolve? Our solutions too

values.title: Excellence
values.description: a premium level of service, without compromise

values.title: Security
values.description: we master regulatory and contractual environments

values.title: Sustainability
values.description: we build solid, scalable and sustainable solutions

why.title:
Why
EBHI?
why.description1: Because you're not looking for a subcontractor, but a trusted partner. Because you need reliable, available, supervised and scalable resources. Because you want to go faster, further, without losing control or quality.
why.description2: You have a project? We have the structure to make it happen.

services.title: Recruitment & placement of exclusive talents
items: Selection of multilingual, qualified, trained and immediately available profiles.
Supervision of dedicated teams in customer service, customer relations, back-office, commerce, purchasing, quality and production.

services.title: Digital & communication
items: Design, redesign and maintenance of web platforms and digital tools.
Branding, UX/UI design, visual content production.
Digital marketing strategies, newsletters, community management.

services.title: Outsourced technical solutions
items: Creation of outsourced design offices.
Provision of specialized technical teams
Possibility of on-site interventions in France.

services.title: Organization & infrastructure
items: Access to equipped workspaces in our hubs.
Corporate concierge services, logistics and technical coordination.
Multi-zone project monitoring with dedicated interface.

hero.title:
Outsourcing differently:
rigor, performance and mastery
hero.subtitle: At EBHI, we don't offer standardized outsourcing. We build with you a tailor-made, optimized and remotely managed organization, to lighten your operational load, improve your performance and save you time without compromising on quality.

highlight.label: Our strength :
highlight.text: structured, human and strategic support, from A to Z.

domains.title:
Areas of
intervention
domains.subtitle: EBHI provides you with specialized and immediately operational resources, according to the specific needs of your business sector.

expertises.title:
Our operational
expertise
expertises.subtitle: A 4-step process to transform your needs into concrete solutions

expertises.title: Analysis and needs framing
expertises.description: Every collaboration begins with an in-depth study of your objectives, your internal processes and your specific challenges. This phase allows us to build an ultra-personalized response, in line with your field reality.

expertises.title: Recruitment of qualified talents
expertises.description: We select profiles adapted to your business criteria and your company culture, thanks to rigorous, localized and validated sourcing. Our talents are quickly operational and integrated into a logic of sustainable performance.

expertises.title: Resource setup
expertises.description: Once the profiles are validated, we ensure rapid and structured integration within your organization. Whether it's a dedicated team or a one-off need, our follow-up guarantees continuity, performance and fluidity.

expertises.title: Administrative management and compliance
expertises.description: Contracts, salaries, legal compliance, HR supervision... EBHI handles all administrative procedures. You benefit from a mastered regulatory framework, smooth execution and a high level of reliability.

methodology.title:
A proven
methodology
methodology.subtitle: Our approach is based on a structuring process in four phases
methodology.highlight: Each step is designed to minimize your risks, optimize your costs and maximize your results

phases.title: Analysis and optimization
phases.description: In-depth evaluation of your processes and identification of improvement areas to maximize your efficiency.

phases.title: Resource mobilization
phases.description: Strategic deployment of skills and tools necessary for the success of your project.

phases.title: Integration and continuous monitoring
phases.description: Implementation followed by a permanent optimization process for sustainable results.

phases.title: Project structuring
phases.description: Methodical organization of resources and detailed planning of deployment to ensure success.

cta.title:
Join our
ecosystem
cta.subtitle:
Choosing EBHI means joining a structured, demanding and expanding ecosystem.
We address companies that want to grow differently, with method, rigor and operational intelligence.
cta.highlight: Contact our team to define together the solution that will advance your organization, with complete confidence.

whatWeDo.title:
What we do
for you
whatWeDo.projectDescription:
From need definition to execution, EBHI handles the entire project. We coordinate human, technical, administrative and legal aspects to deliver a 100% operational solution, without friction.
You save time, we take over.

reasons.title: Tailor-made management
reasons.description: Not impersonal subcontracting, but personalized support adapted to your specific needs.

reasons.title: Superior recruitment quality
reasons.description: Rigorous selection of qualified profiles that integrate perfectly into your company culture.

reasons.title: Structured and mastered onboarding
reasons.description: Rapid and effective integration of your teams with continuous monitoring to guarantee performance.

reasons.title: Demanding and reliable support
reasons.description: Regular and transparent monitoring of your projects with constant communication and detailed reports.

reasons.title: Optimal quality-price ratio
reasons.description: High-performing solutions in high-potential markets, maximizing your ROI while reducing your costs.

hero.title:
Why outsource
with EBHI?
hero.subtitle: Unlock your potential, refocus on your growth
hero.description1: In a demanding economic context, the ability to focus on your core business while controlling costs and accelerating development has become essential. Outsourcing is no longer about simply delegating a task, but about making the strategic choice of performance, flexibility and resource optimization.
hero.description2: At EBHI, we have redefined outsourcing as a structuring growth lever. Thanks to our tailor-made approach, we give you access to high-level skills, rigorous management and tangible results, while reducing risks and costs.

advantages.title: Cost reduction, without compromising quality
advantages.description: Salaries, social charges, premises, equipment, supervision: fixed costs are exploding. Outsourcing allows you to transform these expenses into variable costs, perfectly controlled, while maintaining high performance standards.

advantages.title: Quick access to qualified expertise
advantages.description: We mobilize competent, immediately operational talents, selected according to your business and cultural criteria. No need to invest in a long recruitment process: you have, from the start, adapted and high-performing profiles.

advantages.title: Operational time savings
advantages.description: We handle administrative, legal and HR procedures. You benefit from complete support, which frees up your internal teams and allows you to refocus on high value-added missions.

advantages.title: Instant agility and adaptability
advantages.description: Create, resize or adjust a team according to your activity. Our solutions are designed to evolve with your needs, allowing you to quickly respond to activity peaks, project emergencies or strategic changes.

advantages.title: Quality and continuity guarantee
advantages.description: We ensure rigorous monitoring of each project. Thanks to our internal processes and a results culture, you benefit from stable, high-performing and monitored services, with a single point of contact.

advantages.title: Reduction of operational risks
advantages.description: Outsourcing with EBHI means benefiting from a secure legal, contractual and regulatory framework. We operate in full compliance with local and international laws. You gain peace of mind, while maintaining control.

comparison.title:
Outsourcing or internal management?
Make the right choice

rows.external: Experienced specialists selected according to your needs
Lightened thanks to structured EBHI management
Legal, HR and quality framework ensured by EBHI

cta.title:
EBHI: Outsourcing
reinvented
cta.subtitle: We don't offer standardized services. We build for you a tailor-made, agile, discreet and remarkably effective framework. Our clients choose EBHI for our rigor, our responsiveness, and our ability to deliver more than results: true peace of mind.
cta.question: Want to know more?
cta.description: Tell us about your needs, we will help you design the most suitable solution.

hero.title:
Our strategic
locations
hero.description1: Tailor-made operational bases. Wherever your projects require.
hero.description2: At Entrepreneur Business Hub International (EBHI), we don't just offer you countries to set up in.
hero.description3: We offer you concrete growth levers, immediately activatable, designed to outsource efficiently, coordinate internationally, and boost your overall performance.

hubs.title:
Our operational
hubs
hubs.subtitle: Each hub is a complete ecosystem of talents, infrastructure and services

network.title:
An expanding
international network
network.intro:
Our network covers Morocco, Senegal, Madagascar and France,
and will soon extend to Algeria, Ivory Coast and the Philippines.
network.description1:
Each of our hubs is designed as
an ecosystem of talents, infrastructure and services,
capable of operating your projects seamlessly.
network.description2:
Do you need to structure a multilingual customer service,
an engineering office, a marketing team
or administrative support?
We know where, how, and with which profiles to do it.
Without delay, without extra cost, without compromise.

map.title: Global Presence
map.subtitle:
Strategic hubs distributed across several continents
for optimal coverage

continents.name: Africa
continents.description: Our presence in Africa opens the doors to a growing market with strategic hubs in Morocco, Senegal and Madagascar.

locations.name: Casablanca & Marrakech
locations.description: Gateway to Africa, Morocco is a key country for companies wishing to grow in a stable, modern and connected environment. Casablanca, the country's economic capital, offers a dynamic ecosystem, advantageous taxation and optimal international connectivity. Marrakech, a city that is both tourist and economically booming, represents an ideal platform for service-oriented, event or innovation projects. Thanks to our local locations, EBHI supports project leaders in all their procedures: domiciliation, company creation, tax advice and business development.

locations.name: Dakar
locations.description: Capital of French-speaking West Africa, Dakar is a regional business hub. Our Senegalese hub allows entrepreneurs to access the UEMOA/ECOWAS zone, with support adapted to local realities: legal, administrative, tax and strategic.

locations.name: Antananarivo
locations.description: Antananarivo, the capital of Madagascar, is a hub of innovation and growth where more and more companies are setting up in search of qualified talents, controlled costs and a developing business environment. EBHI helps you set up there effectively, in full compliance.

locations.name: Algiers
locations.description: Our next location in Algeria will give you access to the Maghreb market with a hub dedicated to development and innovation.

locations.name: Abidjan
locations.description: Coming soon, our hub in Abidjan will open the doors to Central Africa with adapted commercial and development services.

continents.name: Europe
continents.description: Our presence in France opens the doors to the European market with strategic offices in Paris and Cergy.

locations.name: Paris, Cergy and national coverage
locations.description: Our presence in France opens the doors to the European market. Thanks to our offices in Paris and Cergy, we support our clients in their location strategy across the entire French territory, whether for domiciliation, commercial representation or administrative procedures. Our services in France are designed for international entrepreneurs, freelancers, start-ups and SMEs wishing to set up or develop in one of the most structured markets in the world.

continents.name: Asia
continents.description: Our expansion in Asia will give you access to a dynamic market with our future hub in the Philippines.

locations.name: Manila
locations.description: Our next location in Manila, the capital of the Philippines, will offer you an Asia-Pacific hub with 24/7 support and privileged access to local talents for your development and outsourcing projects.
